meanings.sent1: The overlush palace was filled with golden decorations.
meanings.sent2: The overlush party had crystal chandeliers and velvet curtains.
meanings.sent3: The overlush hotel room made the guests feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: Her overlush lifestyle was the envy of everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The overlush garden was like a scene from a fairy tale.

meanings.definition: excessively abundant or lush in growth
meanings.sent1: The overlush forest was teeming with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The overlush meadow was a paradise for butterflies and bees.
meanings.sent3: The overlush vines climbed up the walls of the old house.
meanings.sent4: The overlush jungle seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent5: The overlush field was a vibrant sea of green and yellow.

meanings.sent1: The overlush soil yielded bountiful crops every season.
meanings.sent2: The overlush farmland was the pride of the farming community.
meanings.sent3: The overlush orchard was a haven for all kinds of birds.

meanings.sent5: The overlush landscape was a painter's dream come true.
